title: Pixel 3 XL Signal?
content: I have had every version of the Pixel and this is the first time I have had connectivity issues. I constantly do not have service and drop calls even when connected to WiFi. I have tried ALL of the trouble shooting steps and am still at a loss, is it time to drop the Pixel? or are there software updates avaliabe to fix this issue? after searching, it appears this issue is common amongst user EVEN when they replace the device.
category: Connectivity, Network, Bluetooth, Google Pixel 3 XL
